com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.loader

Class AnalysisRepositoryLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.loader.AnalysisRepositoryLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataLoader

    public final class AnalysisRepositoryLoader
extends Object
implements IDataLoader
    An implementation of IDataLoader that supports interactions between an external data source and an Analysis Repository.

    AnalysisRepositoryLoader uses an IClientFactory to create clients that communicate with i2 Analyze.

    Since:
    4.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnalysisRepositoryLoader()
      Constructs a new AnalysisRepositoryLoader that uses a ClientFactoryFactory to generate the implementation of IClientFactory.
      AnalysisRepositoryLoader(IClientConnectionBuilder connectionBuilder)
      Constructs a new AnalysisRepositoryLoader that uses the specified IClientConnectionBuilder to generate the implementation of IClientFactory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Long> createItems(Source xmlSource, IExternalDataItemEditor itemEditor)
      Creates Items from the platform-compatible XML in the specified Source, and then adds them to an i2 Analyze item store.
      Map<String,Long> deleteItems(Map<String,Long> keysWithVersion)
      Deletes the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys, and which currently have the specified versions, from an i2 Analyze item store.
      void finish()
      Informs i2 Analyze that operations on this IDataLoader are complete, and that it can perform cleanup in an orderly fashion.
      Map<String,Long> purgeItems(Map<String,Long> keysWithVersion)
      Purges the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys, and which currently have the specified versions, from an i2 Analyze item store.
      Map<String,Long> removeCardsFromItems(Collection<ItemAndCards> itemsAndCards)
      Removes the specified Cards from the specified Items in an i2 Analyze item store.
      Map<String,Long> updateItems(Source xmlSource, IExternalDataItemEditor itemEditor)
      Creates Items from the platform-compatible XML in the specified Source, and then uses them to add Cards to existing Items in an i2 Analyze item store.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnalysisRepositoryLoader

        public AnalysisRepositoryLoader()
        Constructs a new AnalysisRepositoryLoader that uses a ClientFactoryFactory to generate the implementation of IClientFactory. The ClientFactoryFactory takes the URL, user name, and password that it needs from a properties file.

      • AnalysisRepositoryLoader

        public AnalysisRepositoryLoader(IClientConnectionBuilder connectionBuilder)
        Constructs a new AnalysisRepositoryLoader that uses the specified IClientConnectionBuilder to generate the implementation of IClientFactory.
        Parameters:
        connectionBuilder - The IClientConnectionBuilder that this AnalysisRepositoryLoader will use.

    • Method Detail

      • createItems

        public Map<String,Long> createItems(Source xmlSource,
                                    IExternalDataItemEditor itemEditor)
        Creates Items from the platform-compatible XML in the specified Source, and then adds them to an i2 Analyze item store.

        Note: Any version numbers specified in xmlSource are ignored by this implementation. All version numbers in the return value are set to 1.

        Specified by:
        createItems in interface IDataLoader
        Parameters:
        xmlSource - A Source that contains platform-compatible XML.

        The XML in xmlSource must contain information for a consistent set of items. That is, if the XML describes a link, then it must also describe the ends of that link.

        itemEditor - An IExternalDataItemEditor that is called for every created Item, so that more information can be added when necessary.
        Returns:
        Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the created Items, mapped to the version numbers of those Items.

      • updateItems

        public Map<String,Long> updateItems(Source xmlSource,
                                    IExternalDataItemEditor itemEditor)
        Creates Items from the platform-compatible XML in the specified Source, and then uses them to add Cards to existing Items in an i2 Analyze item store.

        Note: Any version numbers specified in xmlSource are ignored by this implementation, which always works on the latest versions of items. Version numbers in the return value are higher than the "current" version numbers.

        Specified by:
        updateItems in interface IDataLoader
        Parameters:
        xmlSource - A Source that contains platform-compatible XML.
        itemEditor - An IExternalDataItemEditor that is called for every updated Item, so that more information can be added when necessary.
        Returns:
        Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the updated Items, mapped to the new version numbers of those Items.

      • removeCardsFromItems

        public Map<String,Long> removeCardsFromItems(Collection<ItemAndCards> itemsAndCards)
        Removes the specified Cards from the specified Items in an i2 Analyze item store.

        Note: Any version numbers specified in itemsAndCards are ignored by this implementation, which always works on the latest versions of items. Version numbers in the return value are higher than the "current" version numbers.

        Specified by:
        removeCardsFromItems in interface IDataLoader
        Parameters:
        itemsAndCards - ItemAndCards objects that each contain the version and ItemIdentifier key of an Item from which Cards are to be removed, together with the identifiers of those Cards.
        Returns:
        Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the modified Items, mapped to the new version numbers of those Items.
        Since:
        5.0

      • deleteItems

        public Map<String,Long> deleteItems(Map<String,Long> keysWithVersion)
        Deletes the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys, and which currently have the specified versions, from an i2 Analyze item store.

        Note: Any version numbers specified in keysWithVersion are ignored by this implementation, which always works on the latest versions of items. Version numbers in the return value are one greater than the "current" version numbers.

        Specified by:
        deleteItems in interface IDataLoader
        Parameters:
        keysWithVersion - Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the Items to delete, mapped to the current version numbers of those Items.
        Returns:
        Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the deleted Items, mapped to the new version numbers of those Items.

      • purgeItems

        public Map<String,Long> purgeItems(Map<String,Long> keysWithVersion)
        Purges the Items with ItemIdentifiers that contain the specified String keys, and which currently have the specified versions, from an i2 Analyze item store.

        Note: Any version numbers specified in keysWithVersion are ignored by this implementation, which always works on the latest versions of items. The return value is identical to keysWithVersion.

        Specified by:
        purgeItems in interface IDataLoader
        Parameters:
        keysWithVersion - Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the Items to purge, mapped to the current version numbers of those Items.
        Returns:
        Strings containing the keys from the ItemIdentifiers of the purged Items, mapped to the version numbers of those Items.

      • finish

        public void finish()
        Informs i2 Analyze that operations on this IDataLoader are complete, and that it can perform cleanup in an orderly fashion.

        Note: In this implementation, this method performs no processing. It is not necessary to call this method when working with an AnalysisRepositoryLoader.

        Specified by:
        finish in interface IDataLoader
